text: Looking for a job that allows you to work from the comfort of your own home? We're looking for positive, friendly individuals to take on a new homeworking role as a Customer Service Advisor. Our client is an established business, working on a project for a globally recognised brand. This exciting opportunity offers an almost immediate start date and has a simple, one-stage virtual interview process. Benefits and package of a Customer Service Advisor: A fantastic working from home role. A competitive salary of £21, 000 OTE (£18532 base + Bonus). Computer and full equipment are provided. 40 hours per week, working flexible shifts between 8am - 10pm. Working for a well-known and growing company. Excellent training structure to get you started as a Customer Service Advisor! 28-days holiday. Major staff discounts on the company product range after 3 months. Excellent internal progression & long-term opportunities. Access to a Lifestyle Benefits program. Access to sports and social clubs. Responsibilities of a Customer Service Advisor: To always provide excellent customer service, offering a one call resolution where possible. To take inbound phone calls, and speak with customers who have a query about their service. To keep accurate notes and records on the internal system. To be self-motivated, and to ensure you are always working as part of the wider team. To be comfortable in complaints handling, sometimes dealing with more difficult queries. No previous contact centre or call centre experience is required for this role. Customer service experience, either face-to-face or over the phone, would be beneficial. Previous experience in retail, hospitality or healthcare environments would be ideal. A positive mindset and a proactive attitude towards work. Hardworking and committed to providing the best service. A confident, friendly telephone manner. If you are confident and hardworking, and like the idea of working from home as a Customer Service Advisor, please apply below. Red Recruitment (Agency)
